SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT count(1) FROM s_pay_rank AS a
GROUP BY a.gameId,a.roleid ORDER BY a.amount DESC) as c

SELECT a.roleid, a.clientType, a.uid, a.channelId, a.rolename, a.lastlogin, SUM(a.amount) AS amount, a.gameId, b.gameName FROM s_pay_rank AS a JOIN b_game AS b ON a.gameId = b.id
GROUP BY a.gameId,a.roleid ORDER BY SUM(a.amount) DESC LIMIT #firstResult#, #pageSize#
